> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24842?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [1490d0c...fe3eebd](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24842?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).
there are a number of issues in the OP, are these all tested?

@jreback I added tests for issues 2-3. The last one I think isn't a storage issue, but a formatting one. Sometimes, integers in sparse data structures can be printed as floats if there are `NaN` values involved. Can it be fixed in this PR or should it be considered a separate issue?
```
>>> a=pd.SparseDataFrame(coo_matrix(np.arange(2).reshape(2,1),dtype=np.int64))
>>> a
     0
0  NaN
1  1.0
>>> a[0][1]
1
```
